TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Icon : MarshalByRefObject, ICloneable, IDisposable, System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Icon extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Icon Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements ICloneable, IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class Icon sealed : MarshalByRefObject, ICloneable, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 Windows 图标，它是用于表示对象的小位图图像。

span.span: Represents a Windows icon, which is a small bitmap image that is used to represent an object.

summary.span: 尽管图标的大小由系统决定，但仍可将其视为透明的位图。

span.span: Icons can be thought of as transparent bitmaps, although their size is determined by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以构造从文件、 流或嵌入的资源的对象。You can construct objects from files, streams, or embedded resources. 构造函数的列表，请参阅。For a list of constructors, see . 你还可以将转换使用位图方法。You can also convert an to a bitmap by using the method. 一个图标资源可以包含多个图标图像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一个图标文件可能包含多个大小和颜色深度的图像。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 应用程序中使用的映像取决于操作系统和设置。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 以下列表详细说明了一个图标的典型大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16 像素 x 16 像素16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32 x 32 像素32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48 像素 x 48 像素48 pixels x 48 pixels ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建窗体并将下面的代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 调用`IconToBitmap`方法在窗体的事件处理程序，将传递`e`作为。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个图标资源可以包含多个图标图像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一个图标文件可能包含多个大小和颜色深度的图像。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 应用程序中使用的映像取决于操作系统和设置。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 以下列表详细说明了一个图标的典型大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16 像素 x 16 像素16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32 x 32 像素32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48 像素 x 48 像素48 pixels x 48 pixels 此构造函数将返回包含在指定的流的最小图像。This constructor returns the smallest image that is contained in the specified stream.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and attempts to find a version of the icon that matches the requested size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果与大小完全匹配，找不到版本，则使用最接近的匹配。If a version cannot be found that exactly matches the size, the closest match is used. 如果`original`参数是具有一个大小，则此方法仅创建一个重复的图标。If the `original` parameter is an that has a single size, this method only creates a duplicate icon. 使用的拉伸功能方法调整图标的大小。Use the stretching capabilities of the method to resize the icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建从具有指定的名称的资源`resource`中包含由指定的类型的程序集参数`type`参数。This constructor creates an from a resource with the name specified by the `resource` parameter in the assembly that contains the type specified by the `type` parameter. 此构造函数组合以及字符串名称的资源的给定类型的命名空间，并查找程序集清单中的匹配项。This constructor combines the namespace of the given type together with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest. 例如中传递类型和`Error.ico`到此构造函数，它将查找的资源的名为`System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`。For example you can pass in the type and `Error.ico` to this constructor, and it looks for a resource that is named `System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要运行此示例中，将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和处理该窗体事件。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and handle the form's event. 调用`ConstructAnIconFromAType`方法从事件处理程序，将传递`e`作为。Call the `ConstructAnIconFromAType` method from the event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定的相对路径是相对于当前工作目录。A relative path is assumed to be relative to the current working directory. 当使用位图时，缩略图可能返回而不是一个图标运行应用程序的系统是否导致位图文件显示为缩略图图像的注册表设置。When is used with bitmaps, a thumbnail image may be returned instead of an icon if the system that is running the application has a registry setting that causes bitmap files to be shown as thumbnail images. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`ExtractAssociatedIconEx`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `ExtractAssociatedIconEx` from the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时，您必须通过使用释放的原始图标`DestroyIcon`Win32 API，以确保释放资源中的方法。When using this method, you must dispose of the original icon by using the `DestroyIcon` method in the Win32 API to ensure that the resources are released. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 将该对象绘制到屏幕。Draws that object to the screen. - 获取有关的图标的句柄。Gets an icon handle for the . - 集使表单针对从该句柄创建的图标的属性。Sets the attribute of the form to an icon created from the handle. - 调用 Win32 API 函数`DestroyIcon`释放资源。Calls the Win32 API function `DestroyIcon` to release resources. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当转换为位图，并且生成的位图的透明颜色设置为透明区域的图标都将丢失`RGB(13,11,12)`。The transparent areas of the icon are lost when it is converted to a bitmap, and the transparent color of the resulting bitmap is set to `RGB(13,11,12)`. 返回的位图将具有与原始图标相同的高度和宽度。The returned bitmap has the same height and width as the original icon. > [!NOTE] > 开头的 framework 版本 4.6 支持添加了.ico 文件中的 PNG 帧。Beginning with framework version 4.6 support was added for PNG frames in .ico files. 面向早期版本的 framework 但在 4.6 bits 上运行的应用程序可以选择加入新的行为将添加以下行将对``app.config 文件的部分：``Applications that target earlier versions of the framework but are running on the 4.6 bits can opt in into the new behavior by adding the following line to the `` section of the app.config file:`` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建窗体并将下面的代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 调用`IconToBitmap`中窗体的方法。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's . 事件处理程序，将传递`e`作为。event handler, passing `e` as .
